personalInfo.name: Keny Martin Robles
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer | ERP Integration Specialist | Enterprise Solutions Architect
personalInfo.tagline: Delivering scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications across fintech, telecom, and technology industries
personalInfo.summary: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience delivering scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications across fintech, telecom, and technology industries. Expert in building enterprise solutions using ASP.NET Core, C#, SQL Server, modern JavaScript frameworks (Angular, React), and ERP platforms including Epicor 10 and Kinetic ERP. Skilled in ERP customization, API/REST integration, database optimization, CI/CD automation, and deploying applications in AWS cloud environments.

experience.description: Developing high-performing ASP.NET Core REST APIs and Angular applications with ERP integration, including work on Evoltbay enterprise marketplace platform
achievements: Developed high-performing ASP.NET Core REST APIs integrated with SQL Server and EF Core, reducing latency by 35%
Built modular Angular components with RxJS and lazy loading, improving application responsiveness by 30%
Working on Evoltbay (personal project) - enterprise marketplace platform for government and commercial contracting
Automated deployment pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, cutting release cycle time by 50%
Enhanced application security by implementing OAuth2/OpenID Connect authentication and OWASP-aligned validation
Integrated Epicor and Kinetic ERP systems with custom APIs, automating 45% of manual processing
Implemented centralized logging and monitoring with Serilog and AWS CloudWatch, reducing MTTR by 45%

experience.description: Built React applications with GraphQL APIs and Docker microservices
achievements: Built React applications integrated with GraphQL APIs, reducing redundant data fetches
Managed state across applications using Redux Toolkit, ensuring consistent performance
Implemented Docker-based microservices, standardizing environments and reducing deployment failures
Created automated CI pipelines with GitHub Actions, enabling continuous testing
Increased unit test coverage with Jest and React Testing Library, reducing production defects by 25%
Built reporting and dashboard modules integrated with Epicor ERP, improving financial visibility

experience.description: Directed design and development of Angular-based SPAs and ASP.NET Core services
achievements: Directed the design and development of Angular-based SPAs with NgRx for state management
Delivered ASP.NET Core services supporting account management, billing, and notifications
Managed SQL Server database schemas and ETL pipelines for multi-tenant workloads
Established CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps with blue-green deployments, enabling zero-downtime releases
Introduced feature flags and A/B testing frameworks, improving decision making through real-time metrics
Integrated ERP (Epicor/Kinetic) APIs with billing and account modules, enabling seamless data exchange

experience.description: Spearheaded development of ASP.NET MVC applications and ERP system integration
achievements: Spearheaded the development of ASP.NET MVC applications with C#, jQuery, and SQL Server
Oversaw the enterprise rollout of Epicor 10 ERP, integrating with authentication and reporting systems
Customized Epicor modules and built reporting extensions for financial workflows
Enhanced database performance with indexing strategies, reducing query times by 50%
Implemented automated build and release pipelines, reducing human errors
Mentored a team of five developers, improving skillsets in .NET development and ERP integrations

projects.title: Evoltbay - Enterprise Marketplace Platform (Personal Project)
projects.description: A comprehensive digital marketplace platform for enterprise and government contracting commerce. Built as a personal project to explore modern web technologies and create innovative solutions for business-to-business transactions.
features: Secure government and enterprise contracting marketplace
Real-time bidding and proposal management system
Advanced compliance and regulatory tracking
Multi-tenant architecture supporting diverse industries
Integrated payment processing and escrow services
AI-powered contract analysis and risk assessment
Comprehensive audit trails and reporting
Mobile-responsive design for on-the-go access

projects.title: Enterprise ERP Integration Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive integration platform connecting Epicor and Kinetic ERP systems with custom web applications. Features real-time data synchronization, automated workflows, and advanced reporting capabilities.
features: Real-time ERP data synchronization across multiple systems
Custom API endpoints for order management and invoicing
Automated workflow processing reducing manual tasks by 45%
Advanced reporting dashboard with financial analytics
OAuth2/OpenID Connect authentication and authorization
Comprehensive API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI

projects.title: High-Performance REST API Suite
projects.description: Enterprise-grade REST API platform built with ASP.NET Core, featuring advanced caching, pagination, and performance optimization. Integrated with SQL Server and Entity Framework for maximum efficiency.
features: Optimized database queries reducing latency by 35%
Advanced caching strategies with Redis integration
Comprehensive pagination and filtering capabilities
Automated API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI
Centralized logging and monitoring with Serilog
OAuth2 authentication with role-based authorization

projects.title: Angular Enterprise Dashboard
projects.description: Modern Angular-based single-page application with NgRx state management, featuring real-time data visualization, responsive design, and seamless ERP integration.
features: Modular Angular components with lazy loading
Advanced state management with NgRx
Real-time data visualization and analytics
Responsive design optimized for all devices
Integration with multiple ERP systems
Comprehensive unit testing with Jasmine/Karma

projects.title: CI/CD Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Comprehensive DevOps solution featuring automated build, test, and deployment pipelines. Supports multiple environments with blue-green deployments and zero-downtime releases.
features: Automated CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 50%
Blue-green deployment strategy for zero-downtime releases
Docker containerization for consistent environments
Automated testing with unit, integration, and E2E tests
Code quality gates with SonarQube integration
Multi-environment deployment support (dev, staging, prod)
